title.rendered: The recently released POCO F4 GT, now for 100 euros less

content.rendered:
Today we talk about LITTLE F4 GT, a 5G phone recently launched on the market that stands out for its excellent design, but also has specifications to match. POCO has been known for launching phones with excellent value for money and this is yet another example.

POCO with 6.67-inch AMOLED

This POCO F4 GT 5G may sound familiar to you, since it really is the European version of the Xiaomi Redmi K50 Gaming Edition. It stands out for a wonderful 6.67-inch AMOLED screen that has a refresh rate of 120 Hz, something essential given its gaming specialization, to reach 120 frames per second. Touch sampling reaches 480 Hz. DCI-P3, MEMC, TrueColor and HDR10 are not missing.

Presents a FHD+ resolution (2,400 x 1,080 pixels) and its screen is protected against bumps and scratches with the Corning Gorilla Glass Victus specification and a screen density of 518 ppi.

Inside we will find the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor from Qualcomm along with an Adreno 730 GPU. Qualcomm’s first 4nm chip with the latest generation CPU and GPU ensures higher performance and lower power consumption. Today’s model has 8 GB of LPDDR5 RAM (6400 Mbps) + UFS 3.1.

The use of two steam chambers (State-of-the-art stainless steel VC and VC 3D step) together with a huge 6904mm² graphene layer and 3D high-power graphite, as well as other innovative materials, enables effective layered heat transfer from inside to outside . With such cooling, it will be almost impossible for your mobile to heat up.

Sony cameras, autonomy and fast charging

As we said before, gaming phones are also quite good in other aspects and here POCO has decided to demonstrate it in its camera module with LEDs to give a gaming touch, which also functions as notification LEDs. Lights up for incoming calls, messages, battery charging, and game turbo mode.

POCO F4 GT Colors

The cameras are quite interesting, highlighting the 64 MP main camera with Sony IMX686, which is accompanied in the rear module by an 8 MP ultra wide angle and a 2 MP macro camera. The selfie camera is 20 MP.

As video games are one of the activities that consume the most battery on a mobile, this POCO presents a 4700 mAh dual-cell battery with MTW (Multiple Tab Winding) technology so you don’t have to worry about staying halfway through your game.

Also has 120W fast charge which should charge the mobile to 100% in only 17 minutes or in 27 minutes if you do it while you continue playing.

The previous price of this POCO F4 GT 5G was 599.90 euros, but, after a 17% reduction, its price drops to €499. Without a doubt, those 100 euros of savings are well worth it to finish deciding on this beast of a mobile phone.

Is available in three colors: Electro Yellow, Silver Steel and Solid Blackall of them on sale.
